agents.notes: If you don't have a ticket, paste the problem statement + constraints + ACs.
This is the single source of truth for implementation + files to touch.

stop_conditions: If acceptance criteria for critical paths are missing, ask the ticket author.
If a breaking change is required, produce a migration/rollout plan and get approval.
notes: Tip: When the change is tiny (style/test/docs), you can skip Backlog and sometimes even Spec; go straight to Implementer + Reviewer.
Always paste outputs between agents as JSON (no extra commentary) to keep them deterministic.
